mdRecord.dcterms:title: Reclamation in the South, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Galt, Charles Franklin (American painter, 1884-after 1926) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This lunette is one of eight along the west end mezzanine that illustrate Missouri's development and resources. The view here is of the lowlands of southeast Missouri, one time swamp land that was transformed into fertile valley through a system of drainage canals. The land is plowing in neat rows of crops dotted with farmhouses -- http://collections.si.edu/search/results.htm?q=reclamation+of+the+south&tag.cstype=all. [work]
